thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 14 of 260
thread.title: Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: All goods ordered have been excellent as far as quality and delivery. Restaurant Groupons are great except for all the restrictions as far as times accepted, dine in only, and requirements of people in dining party. I don't like being limited to certain days and or times. I don't like requirements of other people having to be with me to use. Other than those provisions Groupon is fantastic.
